mapper.sql: id, title, content, category, author_id, author_name, view_count, like_count, comment_count, collect_count, is_top, top_expire_time, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_post (title, content, category, author_id, author_name, view_count, like_count, comment_count, collect_count, is_top, top_expire_time, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{authorId}, #{authorName}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{collectCount}, #{isTop}, #{topExpireTime}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT FROM community_post WHERE author_id = #{userId} AND status != 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_post
AND status = 1
AND category = #{request.category}
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%'))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_post p INNER JOIN community_post_collect c ON p.id = c.post_id
AND c.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1
AND (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%'))

SELECT p.*, c.create_time as collect_time FROM community_post p INNER JOIN community_post_collect c ON p.id = c.post_id
AND c.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1
AND (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY c.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
